node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者為 60 歲女子，與第 238、242、261 及 262 宗個案患者曾一同到過加拿大，並參與玻利維亞的一個旅行團。患者 3 月 14 日有腹瀉的症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient travelled to Canada with patients no 238, 242, 261 and 262, and they joined a tour to Bolivia.   The patient started having diarrhoea on Mar 14.

groups.description_zh: 7 名港人同遊加拿大，期間參加了當地本地團前往黃刀鎮、玻利維亞、秘魯、亞馬遜河等，返港後多名團員確診。
groups.description_en: 7 Hongkongers touring to Canada and further to Yellowknife, Bolivia, Peru and Amazon were confirmed infected upon return to Hong Kong.

node.location_en: Tsui Ching House, Hang Tsui Court
node.remarks_zh: 住址於 4 月 1 日經古桂耀議員碓認為柴灣杏翠苑
node.remarks_en: Address was confirmed to be Hang Tsui Court in Chai Wan by District Councillor Johnny Ku on Apr 1

node.location_zh: 加拿大、秘魯、亞馬遜河及玻利維亞
node.location_en: Canada, Peru, Amazon River and Bolivia
node.remarks_zh: 在加拿大參與一個當地旅行團，涉及 30 多人
node.remarks_en: Joined a group tour in Canada to South America of around 30+ people

node.location_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.remarks_zh: 3 月 14 日開始腹瀉，與個案 #238, #242, #261 及 #田262 有流行病學關連 ( 玻利維亞旅行團 )
node.remarks_en: Developed diarrhoea since Mar 14, has epidemiological linkage to cases 238, 242, 261 and 262 (Bolivia Tour)
